data.title: Mr Michael T Simpson : Oral and maxillofacial surgery
data.text:
Bupa Platinum consultant

Fee assured

Awaiting verification

Open Referral network

Offers

Face-to-face consultations

Video and telephone consultations

About us

Senior consultant in The Beds, Herts and Bucks Oral and Maxillofacial network which i helped to create.

Wide experience of who does what well locally and Nationally, if i am not the best i know who to refer to and have no hesitation in doing so.

Family man and was a CD of Surgery in Bedford Hospital.

Areas of interest

Implants/Pre implant surgery

Skin Lesions/cancer of the Head and Neck

Salivary Gland problems,TMJ conditions

Oral Surgery

Maxillofacial surgery

Medical secretaries

Suzanne Elliot

Lonach 8A Bushmead Avenue Bedford MK40 3QL
